channel.title: CVE Feed for Fluent Bit -- Fluent Bit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fluent Bit -- Fluent Bit

item.title: CVE-2024-4323|2024-08-01T20:40:46.485Z -- fluent%20bit -- fluent%20bit
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability in Fluent Bit versions 2.0.7 thru 3.0.3. This issue lies in the embedded http server’s parsing of trace requests and may result in denial of service conditions, information disclosure, or remote code execution.
